  DST_COLOR_SBLEND = GL_DST_COLOR, ONE_MINUS_DST_COLOR_SBLEND = GL_ONE_MINUS_DST_COLOR, SRC_ALPHA_SATURATE_SBLEND = GL_SRC_ALPHA_SATURATE, SRC_ALPHA_SBLEND = GL_SRC_ALPHA,

Detailed Description

MGBlendFunc defines the attributes of Blend function.
